audio_description: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Assalamualaikum! Welcome to my channel, Roshni Cooking. How are you all, viewers? I hope you're all doing well. Today I'm going to teach you how to make very delicious Mutton Biryani.

actions: None directly shown in the frames, but implied actions include preparing or garnishing biryani (seasoning and presenting the dish)
Placing mint leaves on top of the biryani
Serving the biryani onto a plate
Opening the package of Sindhi Biryani mix
Taking out packets from the box
Placing seasoning packets on the cutting board
Opening the green packet box of Shan instant noodles
Stirring the contents of the pot
Mixing bay leaves with meat and onions
Adding garam masala to the pot
Removing the lid from the pot
Showing the contents of the pot (meat and potatoes in tomato curry base)
Placing a lid on the pressure cooker
Holding the lid with a cloth/glove
Adding coriander leaves to the cooked meat
Mixing ingredients (rice, cumin seeds, herbs, and fried pieces)
Adding fried onions on top of rice and curry
Drizzling sauce over rice and masala
Pouring yellow spice or butter onto the rice and mutton
Adding red chutney or sauce onto the rice and mutton
Adding more cooked rice to the pan

audio_description: This was requested by one of my sisters—I forgot her name—who had asked me to teach how to make Mutton Biryani using Shan Masala. So today, I’m going to show you how. Mutton Biryani made with Shan Masala turns out extremely delicious.
